sense.def:
To resist something
pomeni, da nočemo sprejeti nečesa, na primer spremembe, in da poskušamo tisto preprečiti.

seg.quote: Our trade union has resisted the introduction of automation.

sense.def:
To resist an attack
pomeni bojevati se proti napadalcem.

seg.quote: Any attack will be resisted with force if necessary.

sense.def:
To resist the temptation to do something
pomeni premagati skušnjavo, da bi nekaj naredili.

seg.quote: I resisted the temptation to get very drunk.
